title: GitHub Autohotkey Languages Daily Trending
description: Daily Trending of Autohotkey Languages in GitHub

items.title: CemuUser8/mouse2joystick_custom_CEMU
items.description: An AutoHotkey Script to allow the use of Mouse and Keyboard control in CEMU. This uses vJoy and provides several additional features over regular keyboard control, like: the ability to control the camera with the mouse, toggle walking speed, in BotW use MouseWheel to change weapons, a separate Toggle key for ZL useful for locking onto a target …

items.title: abgox/InputTip
items.description: 一个输入法状态管理工具: 实时提示(鼠标方案/符号方案) + 状态切换(窗口触发/热键触发)
